description: Crispy baked tostadas topped with black beans and veggies. And did I mention they only take 20 minutes to make?
keywords: baked tostadas, Black Bean & Veggie Baked Tostadas
name: Black Bean & Veggie Baked Tostadas
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 c. cooked black beans (or one 15-ounce can, drained and rinsed)
1 c. reduced-fat shredded Mexican blend cheese
toppings: cilantro (cherry tomatoes, avocado, sour cream, salsa, green onions, lime wedges, lettuce)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat olive oil in a medium skillet over medium-high heat. Add fajita seasoning, zucchini, and corn. Cook until zucchini is softened, about 3 minutes. Stir in beans and cook until heated through. Remove from heat.

Place tortillas on large baking sheet that's been sprayed with olive oil or cooking spray. Broil until crisp, about 2 minutes. Add 1/4 cup of cheese and vegetable topping to each tortilla. Return to broiler and broil until cheese has melted, 1-2 minutes more. Add toppings and serve.
